/usr/bin/c++   -g   CMakeFiles/HelloWorld.dir/main.cpp.o  -o bin/HelloWorld -rdynamic bin/libpann.so /usr/lib/openmpi/lib/libmpi_cxx.so /usr/lib/openmpi/lib/libmpi.so /usr/lib/openmpi/lib/libopen-rte.so /usr/lib/openmpi/lib/libopen-pal.so -ldl -lnsl -lutil -lm -ldl /usr/local/lib/libboost_mpi-gcc43-mt-1_38.so /usr/local/lib/libboost_thread-gcc43-mt-1_38.so -lnsl -lutil -lm /usr/local/lib/libboost_mpi-gcc43-mt-1_38.so /usr/local/lib/libboost_thread-gcc43-mt-1_38.so -Wl,-rpath,/home/booble/pann/bin:/usr/lib/openmpi/lib:/usr/local/lib
